document.full_text: a panel that hears misconduct complaints about federal judges in the sixth circuit said a bankruptcy judge could keep his membership at belle meade, an exclusive nashville club.
document.title: sidebar: weighing the place of a judge in a club of 600 white men
lines_and_colors: a panel that hears misconduct complaints about federal judges in the sixth circuit said a bankruptcy judge could keep his membership at belle meade, an exclusive nashville club.
